scripts.build:packages: npm --workspace @tonogotchi/shared run build && npm --workspace @tonogotchi/db run build && npm --workspace @tonogotchi/ton run build
scripts.build:apps: npm --workspace @tonogotchi/api run build && npm --workspace @tonogotchi/worker run build
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
